description: Single storey rear and side extension (wrap around); rear roof extension; addition of two windows to the south side elevation at first and second floor levels; construction of an outbuilding to the rear garden
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: A-1200 - Proposed Ground & First Floor Plans, A-1201 - Proposed Second Floor & Roof Plan, A-1250 - Proposed Rear Elevation and Long Section REV 02, A-1251 - Proposed Side Elevations, A-1300 - Proposed Site Plan showing proposed outbuilding, A-1301 - Proposed Outbuilding Plan and Elevations, A-1400 - Comparison between Permitted Development Allowance and Proposed Development.

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building as listed within Section 9 of the Planning Application Form.

REASON:	To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 7.4, 7B and 7D of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), policies 1.1 (h)(j), 1.2 (f), 2.1 and 2.10, and policies 7.1, 7.2, 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan (2015).
